data.text:
Health care in Colorado is in crisis. Costs are crushing families and straining our budget. 

As governor, I’ll launch a first-ever Colorado public option so working people can get quality coverage they can afford.

🔗 https://t.co/n54FYUUHwt https://t.co/giwViJoXth

Today I’m rolling out a cornerstone of my campaign: a plan to transform our health care system with a Colorado public option.

I’m running for governor to take on health care costs and make quality coverage affordable for working Coloradans. https://t.co/hCtXY1BlN5

We need real limits, real oversight, and real consequences for Constitutional violations.

And that starts with new leadership: Kristi Noem and Stephen Miller need to go. https://t.co/jPsN9KU10f

Colorado’s elections are the gold standard and I won’t let Trump sabotage them. 

As your next governor, I’ll defend your vote. https://t.co/YXvVJnl6gn

Big news! Developers withdrew the Palmer Lake Buc-ee’s annexation bid.

I pushed back early, calling this “flagpole annexation” a threat to the open spaces that define our state. Glad to see local voices stand strong. https://t.co/zXmIAViorp

Health care is a human right. I’ve always believed that.

Let’s make that a reality here in Colorado. https://t.co/gDwCnAme5v

This weekend was jam-packed across Colorado but two stops said it all:

🥫 Meet & Greet at Good Shepherd Food Pantry about why I want to be your next governor and the fight ahead.
🏠 Arvada Affordability Roundtable on what’s driving costs up and how I plan to address it. https://t.co/ADLVMbgXOh
